description:
Richard looks at The New Right in education for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at what The New Right believe and how they differ from other theories of education. Ideal for preparing you for your A Level Sociology exam.

Click here for the full course, or visit this link: http://bit.ly/30id5tm
